content: Autofeed unit DD AF-CA ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Diamond coring- - - ### FEATURES:Features Unmatched productivity with fully automated drilling process Automatic surface detection, water management, hole starting, iron boost and through-hole detection Intelligent algorithm for immediate reaction to any change in the characteristics of the base material Applies optimum power during the drilling process, resulting in extended equipment lifetime and faster drilling progress No exposure to vibration â€“ for greater operating safety and higher working comfort Applications Serial drilling of through-holes and penetrations Corner holes for sawing Large diameters and deep hole drilling Stitch coring for installing cable trays Drilling where access to the hole is difficult ### TECHNICAL DATA: For use with: DD 350-CA, DD 500-CA Weight: 9.92 lb.
